name: Do (not) go into the gentle night
name_original: Do (not) go into the gentle night
description:
Nothing is as it seems - and yet, this dreary phrase is your reality. The shadows have been creeping in closer and closer, as if looking for warmth. You don't want them stuck to you but you already know you cannot change them or yourself.

And still, the brown leaves cling to the trees while the autumn winds howl. And still, he keeps calling. And still, you have to keep going.

_________

Survive in this piece of Interactive Fiction - or die trying. But don't worry if you do. Afterall, the hunt is more exciting than the homecoming feast, is it not?

_________

! A lot of the sounds and formatting only works if you download the game first (scroll down a bit) and open it in your browser.
! Designed for a bigger screen but generally playable on mobile devices.

~15k words which amount to ~20 minutes for a full playthrough.

CW: death, mentions of attempted suicide, flashy text effects in some scenes, a pinch of gore, some swear words
